Row.Text: +50% combat experience for air units trained in this city. +2 air unit slots in Aerodrome district. Allows the ability to airlift land units between Aerodrome districts with Airports after the Rapid Deployment civic is unlocked.
+25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.
+25% combat experience for all melee and ranged land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.
Increases the strength of your outer defenses.

A building unique to Japan. +4 [ICON_Production] Production to all cities within 6 tiles. After researching the Electricity technology this building provides an additional +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture to its city.
Bonus is extended to all cities within 6 tiles.
A building unique to America. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism pressure from this city towards other civilizations in the Modern era.
+25% combat experience for air units trained in this city. +2 air unit slots in Aerodrome district.
+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city.
A building unique to Arabia. Bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to the adjacency bonus of the Campus district.
+25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city. Faster Corps and Army training.
Missionary and Apostles created here have +1 spread.
Holds [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Works of Art. May not be built in a Theater Square district that already has an Archaeological Museum.
Holds [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts. May not be built in a Theater Square district that already has an Art Museum.
Bonus extends to each city center within 6 tiles.
Faster Fleet and Armada training. +25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city.
Allows the purchasing of Missionaries. Missionaries can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
+25% combat experience for all cavalry class units trained in this city. May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Barracks.
+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. Bonus [ICON_Production] Production equal to the adjacency bonus of the Harbor district.
Bonus extends to each city center within 6 tiles.
Raises the strength of your outer defenses to the highest possible level.
A building unique to Norway. Required to train Apostles. Holy Site districts get an additional standard adjacency bonus from Woods.
Allows the purchasing of Apostles. Apostles can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.

Provides Walls around the City Center and Encampment district. Walls allow [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strikes from the City Center and Encampment district, and must be defeated before a city can be assaulted.
[ICON_RESOURCE_RICE] Rice and [ICON_RESOURCE_WHEAT] Wheat resources gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food each. City must be adjacent to a River.
Bonus extends to each city center within 6 tiles.
+1 Military policy slot[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides the same defensive bonuses as the Fort improvement. Must be built on Hills adjacent to an Encampment district.
+1 Economic policy slot[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Doubles current treasury. Must be built next to a River adjacent to a Commercial Hub district with a Bank.
Awards 2 randomly-chosen free civics when completed. Must be built on flat land adjacent to a Theater Square district.
1 free random Atomic era civic boost. Must be built on flat land adjacent to a Theater Square district.
+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture to all Rainforest tiles for this city. +1 [ICON_Production] Production to all Rainforest tiles for this city. Must be built on Rainforest.
The Colosseum's [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Amenities] Amenities are extended to each city center within 6 tiles. Must be built on flat land adjacent to an Entertainment Complex district.
+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. Grants a Trader unit. Must be built on the Coast, adjacent to land and a Harbor district.

[ICON_Tourism] Tourism output from [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics and Holy Cities is not diminished by other civilizations who have researched The Enlightenment civic. Doubles [ICON_Tourism] Tourism output of Seaside Resorts across your civilization. Must be built on Hills.
All tiles in your civilization gain +2 Appeal. Must be built on flat land adjacent to the City Center.
+2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in each city in your civilization. Must be built on flat land adjacent to an Entertainment Complex district with a Stadium.
+1 Wildcard policy slot[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built on flat land adjacent to the City Center.
Receive boosts to all Ancient and Classical era technologies. Must be built on flat land adjacent to a Campus district with a Library.
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all naval units[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built on the Coast, and adjacent to land and a Harbor district with a Lighthouse.

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city get +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every Bonus resource in this city's territory. Must be built adjacent to a Commercial Hub district with a Market and adjacent to [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] Cattle.
Missionaries and Apostles can spread Religion 1 extra time. Must be built on flat land adjacent to a Holy Site district, and you must have founded a Religion.
Increases growth by 15% in all cities. Must be built next to a River.
Must be built along a River.
Grants 2 Apostles. Must be built on Woods adjacent to a Holy Site district with a Temple, and you must have founded a Religion.
All Apostles you create gain the Martyr ability in addition to a second ability you chose normally. Must be built on Floodplains or Marsh.

Patronage of Great People costs 25% less [ICON_Faith] Faith. Districts in this city provide +2 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (for example, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points from the Theater Square district). Must be built on Hills.
+20% [ICON_Science] Science in this city, and awards 2 randomly-chosen free technologies when completed. Must be built on Grassland or Plains adjacent to a Campus district with a University.
+1 Diplomatic policy slot[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built on a Hill adjacent to a Mountain.
+2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +1 [ICON_Production] Production on all Desert tiles for this city (non-Floodplains). Must be built on Desert or Floodplains without Hills.
Grants a free Builder. All Builders can build 1 extra improvement. Must be built on Desert (including Floodplains) without Hills.

+30% [ICON_Production] Production in this city, and +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each Mine and Quarry in this city. Must be built along a River adjacent to an Industrial Zone district with a Factory.

Grants a free [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet. [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophets may found a Religion on Stonehenge instead of a Holy Site. Must be adjacent to [ICON_RESOURCE_STONE] Stone and on flat land.
Must be built on the Coast, adjacent to land and a Harbor district.

All current units gain a promotion level. All Archaeologists from the owner may enter foreign lands without Open Borders. Must be built on Grassland or Plains adjacent to an Encampment district with a Barracks or Stable.
Receive a second naval unit each time you train a naval unit. Must be built on a Coast tile that is adjacent to an Industrial Zone district.
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying objects of the same type from different artists.
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts of the same era from different civilizations.
Theming bonus doubling output when museum is full.
